overview:
Steve Lemon has spent the past 20 years in the computer software and internet industry. As VP of Engineering at Loopt, he is responsible for the development of products and technology.

Most recently, Steve was Co-Founder and Vice President of Technology at Glimpse.com (now part of TheFind.com). Previously, Steve served as the Vice President of Engineering for Consumer Products and Solutions at Symantec. He was responsible for managing a large engineering organization and overseeing development of Symantecâ€™s $1.5 billion Consumer Product Line. Prior to that, Steve headed the Engineering team at Cendura and grew development and QA teams in both U.S. and India. No stranger to new and successful technology companies, he was the Senior Vice President and General Manager of the Internet Portal Division for Healtheon/WebMD, where he drove M&A technology integration and operated worldwide engineering and business teams. Steve began his career in the 1980s at Xerox and Apple in operating systems design and development on platforms such as the revolutionary Xerox Star Workstation. He holds three U.S. patents in the area of Object Oriented Operating System Technology. Steve holds a BS in Computer Science from The Ohio State University.
